con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1491-A1-1 -- T2G Offline TestCase

con:testStep.name: Stop T2G Ground Server
con:testStep.con:description: Stop T2G server or disable network link between T2G and PIS Ground servers

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1491-A2-1 -- T2G Online TestCase
TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A1-1 -- Correct Login TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to login to the PIS system, and get a session Identifier The request is sent with valid login information.
Expexted Result : The PIS shall return a valid session ID
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0210],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0211]

con:testStep.name: SessionID Property Transfer
con:testStep.con:description: Session ID is stored in project property to be available by other webservices

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A1-2 -- Incorrect Login TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to login to the PIS system, and get a session Identifier The request is sent with invalid login information.
Expected result : The PIS shall return SessionID = 0
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0210],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0212]

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:LoginResult[1]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A1-3 -- Login Session Expiration TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to login to the PIS system, and get a session Identifier.
After the configured period of inactivity, the session shall be closed and the client logged out
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0213],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0214]

con:testStep.name: Session Expiration
con:testStep.con:description: Verify that client application is logout after a configurable period of inactivity. [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0213],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0214]

con:config.con:expectedResult: A session shall expire after a configurable period of inactivity (unit in minutes), defaulted to 480 minutes (8 hours). When a session expires, the Ground PIS shall automatically close the associated session, and logout the client application

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A2-1 -- SetNotificationInformation TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test of the function that allows the GroundApp to provide the notification server URL.
The request is sent with a valid URL.
Expected result : The ground PIS shall acknowledge this request
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0215],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0216],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0217],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0173],

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:SetNotificationInformationResponse[1]/ns1:SetNotificationInformationResult[1]/text()

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A2-2 -- SetNotificationInformation Error Management TestCas
con:testCase.con:description:
Test of the function that allows the GroundApp to provide the notification server URL.
The request is sent with and invalid URL or a bad session ID.
Expected result : The PIS shall return an error
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0173] [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0271]

con:request.name: SetNotificationInformation Invalid URL
con:request.con:description: An invalid URL is sent

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:SetNotificationInformationResponse[1]/ns1:SetNotificationInformationResult[1]/text()

con:request.name: SetNotificationInformation Bad Session ID
con:request.con:description: An invalid session ID is sent

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:SetNotificationInformationResponse[1]/ns1:SetNotificationInformationResult[1]/text()

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A3-1 -- Logout TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to logout from the PIS system
Expexted Result : The PIS shall verify the session identifier, stop the notification request associated to this session, and close the specified session.
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0218],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0219]

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:LogoutResponse[1]/ns1:LogoutResult[1]/text()

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A3-2 -- Logout Error Management TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to logout from the PIS system
The Logout request is sent with an invalid sessionID.
Expected result : The PIS shall return invalid session ID error
Requirements ; [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0272]

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:LogoutResponse[1]/ns1:LogoutResult[1]/text()

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A4-2 -- IsSessionValid Expired TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the status of a session. The ground PIS returns one of the following statuses: “active” or “expired”.
The session associated to the received session identifier has expired.
Expected Result: Ground PIS shall return the status "expired"
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0220],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0221]

con:testStep.name: Session Expiration
con:testStep.con:description: Wait for Session expiration delay or Logout

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:IsSessionValidResult[1]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1440-A4-1 -- IsSessionValid Active TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the status of a session. The ground PIS returns one of the following statuses: “active” or “expired”.
The session associated to the received session identifier is active.
Expected Result: Ground PIS shall return the status "active"
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0220],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0221]

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/session/'; //ns1:IsSessionValidResult[1]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1450-A1-1 -- GetAvailableElementList TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0011], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0012], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0013], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0014], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0015], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0016]

con:testStep.name: Check Response content
con:testStep.con:description: Check available element in response Also check online status

con:config.con:expectedResult: PIS shall return the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1450-A2-1 -- RetrieveMessageTemplateList Element TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test GroundApp request from the ground PIS the list of available IM templates
The Adressee is identified by its Element Alpha Number.
Expected Result : PIS shall return the template list extracted from the PIS basic package.
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0017], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0018]

con:config.con:expectedResult: PIS shall return the list of available IM templates

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1450-A2-2 -- RetrieveMessageTemplateList Mission Commercial Number TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test GroundApp request from the ground PIS the list of available IM templates
Adressee is identified by Mission Commercial Number.
Expected Result : PIS shall return template list extracted from the PIS basic package. If the mission is running on more than one element, the list shall combine the templates from each element without duplicates.
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0017], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0018], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0019]

con:config.con:expectedResult: PIS shall return the list of available IM templates

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1450-A2-3 -- RetrieveMessageTemplateList Mission Operator Code TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test GroundApp request from the ground PIS the list of available IM templates
Adressee is identified by Mission Operator Code.
Expected Result : PIS shall return template list extracted from the PIS basic package. If the mission is running on more than one element, the list shall combine the templates from each element without duplicates.
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0017], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0018], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0019]

con:config.con:expectedResult: PIS shall return the list of available IM templates

con:testCase.con:description:
Test GroundApp request from the ground PIS the list of available IM templates
When the request is send with invalid information, PIS shall return an error

con:request.name: RetrieveMessageTemplateList Bad session ID
con:request.con:description: The session ID sent is invalid

con:request.name: RetrieveMessageTemplateList Unknown Mission ID
con:request.con:description: Mission number is invalid

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep
con:testStep.con:description: On PIS ground, remove current predef.lua in D:\WCF\DB\DBData\PISBASE

con:request.name: RetrieveMessageTemplateList Unknown Element Number
con:request.con:description: Element alpha number is invalid

con:request.name: RetrieveMessageTemplateList No Predef.lua
con:request.con:description: No PIS basic package is available in the database. Expected Result : PIS shall return No IM template error

con:testStep.con:description: Use an invalid predef.lua file (containing additional instructions other than dictionary, timer, util, predef, language)

con:request.name: RetrieveMessageTemplateList Invalid Predef.lua
con:request.con:description: The PIS package does not include any IM templates. Expected Result : PIS shall return No IM template error

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1460-A1-1 -- GetAvailableElementList TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.
The request is sent with a valid session ID.
Expected result : The ground PIS shall reply with the list of available elements For each element in the elements list shall include the version number of the PIS Basic data package (which includes IM templates definition) the version of the LMT data package (which contains the stations list) and the id of the current running mission (both the Mission Commercial Number and the Mission Operator Code). If the element is not in a mission, the mission Id parameter shall be omitted.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0011], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0012], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0013], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0014], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0015], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0016]

con:configuration.path: declare namespace ns1='http://alstom.com/pacis/pis/ground/maintenance/'; //ns1:ResultCode[1]

The request is sent with invalid informations
Expected result : PIS shall return an error.

TC_PIS_Sy_1450-A1-1 -- GetAvailableElementDataList TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.
The request is sent with a valid session ID.
Expected result : The ground PIS shall reply with the list of available elements For each element in the elements list shall include the version number of the PIS Basic data package (which includes IM templates definition) the version of the LMT data package (which contains the stations list) and the id of the current running mission (both the Mission Commercial Number and the Mission Operator Code). If the element is not in a mission, the mission Id parameter shall be omitted.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0011], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0012], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0013], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0014], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0015], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0016]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1470-A20-6 -- forceAddresseesArchivedBaseline with missing datapackage TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to force an addressee to roll back to the archived baseline already installed on the element’s data store
The request is sent to a Mission Commercial Number that has a baseline with missing or corrupted datapackage
Expected result : PIS shall return RequestID, send "processing", "sent" then "failed" status.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0130], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0131], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0132], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0134]

TC_PIS_Sy_1480-A2-1 -- GetReport for Element TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the PIS to provide files containing the infotainment journaling report.
The request is sent to an Element Alpha Number.
Expected Result :The PIS shall return the Request ID and send status "processing", "downloading" then "download completed". The ground PIS shall download the journaling report files from the selected adressee.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0150], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0151], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0152]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1490-A4-3 -- StopMission Offline then Online Element TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
This function allows the GroundApp to stop an active mission onboard an element.
The request is sent to an offline then online element
Expected result : The ground PIS shall transfer the mission cancellation command to the selected element.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0254],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0255],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0256], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0257],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0258],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0259], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0260],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0261],[RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0262]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1490-A5-1 -- Update command progress status Failed: unknown element TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:

The selected element does not exist in the element data base of the ground PIS
Expected Result : The PIS shall reply with status "failed".
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0269]

con:config.con:expectedResult: There should be the following notifications received: - MissionCommandProgressProcessing - MissionCommandProgressUnknownElementId

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1490-A5-17 -- Update command progress status Failed: ground commands are inhibited on the element TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to initialize an existing mission onboard an element in automatic mode. In automatic mode, an existing mission is initialized using the data already contained in the onboard LMT database
The commands initiated from the Ground PIS are inhibited on board the train’s element. Inhibition of commands from Ground PIS is an onboard maintenance command that prevents the onboard PIS from processing commands originating from the Ground PIS
Expected Result : The PIS shall reply with status "failed".
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0269]

con:config.con:expectedResult: the commands initiated from the Ground PIS are inhibited on board the train’s element
There should be the following notifications received: - MissionCommandProgressProcessing - MissionCommandProgressServiceInhibited

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1490-A6-1 -- GetAvailableElementList TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.
The request is sent with a valid session ID.
Expected result : The ground PIS shall reply with the list of available elements For each element in the elements list shall include the version number of the PIS Basic data package (which includes IM templates definition) the version of the LMT data package (which contains the stations list) and the id of the current running mission (both the Mission Commercial Number and the Mission Operator Code). If the element is not in a mission, the mission Id parameter shall be omitted.
Requirements: [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0011], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0012], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0013], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0014], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0015], [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0016]

con:testCase.name: TC_PIS_Sy_1490-A6-2 -- GetAvailableElementList Error Management TestCase
con:testCase.con:description:
Test the function that allows the GroundApp to request from the ground PIS the list of available elements. This list includes also missions that are running for each element.
The request is sent with a bad session ID.
Expected result : PIS shall return an error.
Requirements : [RefSol_PIS2G_GroundApp_SyID_0273]
